dc_description_s: Metropolitan Police Department (MPD) official offices and site locations. This dataset contains point locations for all publicly identified sites and office locations including headquarters This dataset was created as part of the DC Geographic Information System (DC GIS) for the D.C. Office of the Chief Technology Officer (OCTO)C. government agencies. Facilities and offices were obtained from MPD's Office of Corporate Communications All DC GIS data is stored end exported in Maryland State Plane coordinates NAD 83 meters. METADATA CONTENT IS IN PROCESS OF VALIDATION AND SUBJECT TO CHANGE.
